casebody.data:
[The State, ex rel.] Porter, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Porter v. Indus. Comm. (1986), 25 Ohio St. 3d 34.]

(No. 85-1523 Decided July 9, 1986.) Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, and Merl H. Wayman, for appellant.

The judgment of "the court of appeals (case No. 84AP-988) granting a writ of mandamus is hereby reversed on authority of Vulcan Materials Co. v. Indus. Comm. (1986), 25 Ohio St. 3d 31, decided this date.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, C. Brown, Douglas and Wright, JJ., concur.
